entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweetwater County through 245 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green River, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
